segments.text: Looking into this kitchen, I notice the sink is running full blast.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water's cascading over the sides, soaking the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a waste; someone's going to have to clean that up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman there is oblivious, polishing her plate like nothing's wrong.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her apron's probably getting splashed, but she doesn't care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, check out those kids sneaking cookies from the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's stretched way up on that unstable stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it'll be a disaster with all that water on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's just egging him on, palm open like she's entitled.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets, cookies spilling outâ€”total mess waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The window shows a nice garden, but inside it's a recipe for trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe the adult isn't paying attention to any of this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is infuriating; hazards everywhere.
segments.speaker: PAR
